description.value: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses. At the start of each enemy's turn, you gain an extra reaction you can use only during that turn to perform an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Opportune Riposte], or an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Reactive Strike]{Attack of Opportunity} if you have that reaction.
